member.name: T:VECMATLIB.Transformation
member.summary:
The Transformation class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the M-functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\Gus\Documents\MATLAB\fkin.m
C:\Users\Gus\Documents\MATLAB\LTransform.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m
member.remarks: @Version 0.0

member.name: M:VECMATLIB.Transformation.fkin
member.summary: Provides a single output, 0-input MWArrayinterface to the fkin M-function.
member.remarks: M-Documentation: q list of numbers, commands 1-5 toolLength = 8 or 12 for long short tool T1b is transofrmation from T.m
member.returns: An MWArray containing the first output argument.

member.name: M:VECMATLIB.Transformation.fkin(System.Int32,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[]@,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the fkin function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of MWArrays.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array. M-Documentation: q list of numbers, commands 1-5 toolLength = 8 or 12 for long short tool T1b is transofrmation from T.m
member.param: The number of output arguments to return

member.name: M:VECMATLIB.Transformation.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
